013package org.apache.juneau.examples.bean;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.AtomBuilder.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.AtomBuilder.link;
017import static org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.HtmlBuilder.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.bean.swagger.SwaggerBuilder.*;
019
020import java.net.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.html.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
025
026/**
027 * Sample class which shows the usage of DTO module which is a
028 * Sub module of the core.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class BeanExample {
034
035   /**
036    * DTO Samples
037    *
038    * @param args Unused.
039    * @throws Exception Unused.
040    */
041   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
042   public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
043
044      //Produces
045      /**
046       * <table>
047       * <tr>
048       * <th>c1</th>
049       * <th>c2</th>
050       * </tr>
051       * <tr>
052       * <td>v1</td>
053       * <td>v2</td>
054       * </tr>
055       * </table>
056       */
057      var mytable =
058         table(
059            tr(
060               th("c1"),
061               th("c2")
062            ),
063            tr(
064               td("v1"),
065               td("v2")
066            )
067         );
068
069      var html = HtmlSerializer.DEFAULT.serialize(mytable);
070
071      var mainJsp =
072         form().action("main.jsp").method("GET")
073         .children(
074            input("text").name("first_name").value("apache"), br(),
075            input("text").name("last_name").value("juneau"), br(),
076            button("submit", "Submit"),
077            button("reset", "Reset")
078         );
079
080      /**
081       * <form action='main.jsp' method='POST'>
082       * Position (1-10000): <input name='pos' type='number'
083       * value='1'/><br/>
084       * Limit (1-10000): <input name='pos' type='number'
085       * value='100'/><br/>
086       * <button type='submit'>Submit</button>
087       * <button type='reset'>Reset</button>
088       * </form>
089       */
090      html = HtmlSerializer.DEFAULT.serialize(mainJsp);
091
092      /**
093       * Produces
094       * {
095       *    a:{action:'main.jsp',method:'GET'},
096       *    c:[
097       *    {a:{type:'text',name:'first_name',value:'apache'}},{},
098       *    {a:{type:'text',name:'last_name',value:'juneau'}},{},
099       *    {a:{type:'submit'},c:['Submit']},
100       *    {a:{type:'reset'},c:['Reset']}
101       *    ]
102       * }
103       */
104      html =  Json5Serializer.DEFAULT.serialize(mainJsp);
105
106      var feed =
107         feed("tag:foo.org", "Title", "2016-12-31T05:02:03Z")
108         .setSubtitle(text("html").setText("Subtitle"))
109         .setLinks(
110            link("alternate", "text/html", "http://foo.org/").setHreflang("en"),
111            link("self", "application/atom+xml", "http://foo.org/feed.atom")
112         )
113         .setGenerator(
114            generator("Example Toolkit").setUri("http://www.foo.org/").setVersion("1.0")
115         )
116         .setEntries(
117            entry("tag:foo.org", "Title", "2016-12-31T05:02:03Z")
118            .setLinks(
119               link("alternate", "text/html", "http://foo.org/2005/04/02/atom"),
120               link("enclosure", "audio/mpeg", "http://foo.org/audio/foobar.mp3").setLength(1337)
121            )
122            .setPublished("2016-12-31T05:02:03Z")
123            .setAuthors(
124               person("John Smith").setUri(new URI("http://foo.org/")).setEmail("foo@foo.org")
125            )
126            .setContributors(
127               person("John Smith"),
128               person("Jane Smith")
129            )
130            .setContent(
131               content("xhtml")
132               .setLang("en")
133               .setBase("http://foo.org/")
134               .setText("<div><p><i>[Sample content]</i></p></div>")
135            )
136         );
137
138      var swagger = swagger()
139         .setSwagger("2.0")
140         .setInfo(
141            info("Swagger Petstore", "1.0.0")
142            .setDescription("This is a sample server Petstore server.")
143            .setTermsOfService("http://swagger.io/terms/")
144            .setContact(
145               contact().setEmail("apiteam@swagger.io")
146            )
147            .setLicense(
148               license("Apache 2.0").setUrl(URI.create("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"))
149            )
150         )
151         .addPath("/pet", "post",
152            operation()
153            .setTags("pet")
154            .setSummary("Add a new pet to the store")
155            .setDescription("")
156            .setOperationId("addPet")
157            .setConsumes(MediaType.JSON, MediaType.XML)
158            .setProduces(MediaType.JSON, MediaType.XML)
159            .setParameters(
160               parameterInfo("body", "body")
161               .setDescription("Pet object that needs to be added to the store")
162               .setRequired(true)
163            )
164            .addResponse("405", responseInfo("Invalid input"))
165         );
166
167      // Serialize to Swagger/JSON
168      /**
169       * Produces
170       * {
171       *  "swagger": "2.0",
172       *  "info": {
173       *      "title": "Swagger Petstore",
174       *      "description": "This is a sample server Petstore server.",
175       *      "version": "1.0.0",
176       *      "termsOfService": "http://swagger.io/terms/",
177       *      "contact": {
178       *          "email": "apiteam@swagger.io"
179       *      },
180       *      "license": {
181       *          "name": "Apache 2.0",
182       *          "url": "http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"
183       *      }
184       *  },
185       * "paths": {
186       *      "/pet": {
187       *          "post": {
188       *              "tags": [
189       *                  "pet"
190       *               ],
191       *              "summary": "Add a new pet to the store",
192       *              "description": "",
193       *              "operationId": "addPet",
194       *              "consumes": [
195       *                  "application/json",
196       *                  "text/xml"
197       *              ],
198       *              "produces": [
199       *                  "application/json",
200       *                  "text/xml"
201       *              ],
202       *              "parameters": [
203       *                  {
204       *                      "in": "body",
205       *                      "name": "body",
206       *                      "description": "Pet object that needs to be added to the store",
207       *                      "required": true
208       *                  }
209       *              ],
210       *              "responses": {
211       *                  "405": {
212       *                      "description": "Invalid input"
213       *                  }
214       *              }
215       *         }
216       *      }
217       *  },
218       *  }
219       */
220      var swaggerJson = JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_READABLE.serialize(swagger);
221   }
222}
